As a Postal Service Mail Sorters, Processors, and Processing Machine Operators with Professional Degree, your work involves prepare incoming and outgoing mail for distribution for the united states postal service (usps). examine, sort, and route mail. load, operate, and occasionally adjust and repair mail processing, sorting, and canceling machinery. keep records of shipments, pouches, and sacks, and perform other duties related to mail handling within the postal service. includes postal service mail sorters and processors employed by usps contractors.

occupation.title: Postal Service Mail Sorters, Processors, and Processing Machine Operators
occupation.description: Prepare incoming and outgoing mail for distribution for the United States Postal Service (USPS). Examine, sort, and route mail. Load, operate, and occasionally adjust and repair mail processing, sorting, and canceling machinery. Keep records of shipments, pouches, and sacks, and perform other duties related to mail handling within the postal service. Includes postal service mail sorters and processors employed by USPS contractors.
